hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select EBFH.EBFH_ID, EBFH.EBFH_ESCO_ID, EBFH.EBFH_QUICK_CODE, EBFH.EBFH_CODE, EBFH.EBFH_NAME_CN, EBFH.EBFH_NAME_EN, EBFH.EBFH_IS_RECEIVABLE, EBFH.EBFH_RECEIVABLE_CODE, EBFH.EBFH_IS_PAYABLE, EBFH.EBFH_PAYABLE_CODE, EBFH.EBFH_STATUS, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR1, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR2, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR3, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR4, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR5, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR8, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR7, EBFH.EBFH_SUBSTR6, EBFH.EBFH_SUBDATE1, EBFH.EBFH_SUBDATE5, EBFH.EBFH_SUBDATE4, EBFH.EBFH_SUBDATE2, EBFH.EBFH_SUBDATE3, EBFH.EBFH_SUBNUM1, EBFH.EBFH_SUBNUM2, EBFH.EBFH_SUBNUM3, EBFH.REC_VER, EBFH.CREATE_TIME, EBFH.CREATOR, EBFH.MODIFY_TIME, EBFH.MODIFIER
from EB_FEE_HEAD EBFH where 1=1 <<and EBFH.EBFH_ESCO_ID LIKE '%' || :ebfhEscoId || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_CODE like '%' || :esfhCode || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_NAME_CN like '%' || :esfhNameCn || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_NAME_EN like '%' || :esfhNameEn || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_IS_RECEIVABLE like '%' || :ebfhIsReceivable || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_RECEIVABLE_CODE like '%' || :ebfhReceivableCode || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_IS_PAYABLE like '%' || :ebfhIsPayable || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_PAYABLE_CODE like '%' || :ebfhPayableCode || '%'>> <<and EBFH.EBFH_STATUS = :ebfhStatus>> order by EBFH.EBFH_CODE
